name: Make a Fish
description:
This was a group project that I did a year ago with some college friends.

You customise your own fish with several different heads, bodies, fins, and tails, and then click and swim your way through a large underwater seabed with crabs, treasure chests and other sea creatures.

My contribution to this project was the music, most of the pixel art work, and most of the Construct 2 engine work. My college friends designed the different fish parts, and worked on soem fo the fish like the crabs and jellyfish.
